duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform basic automotive services in the shop area, including tire service and car service duties.
Responsible for tire service duties, such as tire repairs, balancing, and changes, following company SOPs and policies.
Perform car service duties, including lubrications, oil changes, and basic vehicle inspections, following company inspection and recommendations procedures.

Unload and load 20 to 100-pound items from trucks, maintain service center cleanliness and orderliness, comply with safety policies, drive vehicles, and interact with supervisors and managers in a non-sales capacity.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license at all times and ability to learn basic mechanical tasks
